item.title: sepideh add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: sepideh add a quote by Bob Dylan
item.description: "I think women rule the world and that no man has ever done anything that a woman either hasn't allowed him to do or encouraged him to do." -- Bob Dylan

item.title: sepideh add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: sepideh add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "An intellectual? Yes. And never deny it. An intellectual is someone whose mind watches itself. I like this, because I am happy to be both halves, the watcher and the watched. "Can they be brought together?" This is a practical question. We must get down to it. "I despise intelligence" really means: "I cannot bear my doubts." -- Albert Camus

item.title: sepideh add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: sepideh add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "When you are courting a nice girl an hour seems like a second. When you sit on a red-hot cinder a second seems like an hour. That's relativity." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: sepideh add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: sepideh add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is to not stop questioning." -- Albert Einstein
